about.heading: Audit & Advisory Excellence for Businesses in Saudi Arabia
about.description1: Bugis MNR Chartered Accountant is a prominent provider of Audit, Accounting, and Advisory services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. We deliver strategic financial guidance by blending deep regional insight with globally recognized professional standards.
about.description2: Backed by a team of over 70 skilled professionals operating from our offices in Riyadh, across KSA, and the UAE, we support a diverse client base that includes listed companies, large corporates, family-owned businesses, and non-profit entities. Our focus is on strengthening compliance frameworks, improving operational efficiency, and enabling long-term, sustainable growth.

servicesSection.label: Core Services
servicesSection.heading: Scalable Business Services
servicesSection.description: We translate Saudi regulatory requirements into clear, actionable steps so you can focus on growth while staying compliant.

1.heading: Audit & Assurance Services in Saudi Arabia
1.subheading: Ensuring Compliance, Accuracy, and Financial Integrity
1.title: Audit & Assurance
1.description: At Bugis MNR Chartered Accountants, we deliver reliable audit and assurance solutions designed to strengthen governance and build trust. Our team conducts independent evaluations in line with globally accepted standards, ensuring that financial reporting is accurate, compliant, and aligned with applicable regulations. We work closely with our clients to understand their business environment, identify key risk areas, and provide practical recommendations that support informed decision-making and long-term sustainability.

1.name: Abdullah Bugis
1.title: US CPA, SOCPA-licensed Audit Partner
1.description: Abdullah Bugis is a SOCPA-licensed Audit Partner at Bugis MNR Chartered Accountants. He brings extensive experience from Big Four firms and specializes in statutory audits, internal audits, IFRS compliance, and risk management. Mr. Abdullah has led complex audit engagements for large corporates and family-owned businesses across diverse industries and is recognized for his strong leadership, technical expertise, and commitment to delivering high-quality, value-driven audit services.

2.name: Dheeraj Ranasaria
2.title: CA, FCA
2.description: CA Dheeraj Ranasaria (FCA) is a seasoned Audit and Assurance expert with over 2 decades of experience in risk advisory and systems consultancy. Having led complex assignments across all major sectors, he specializes in IFRS, IAS, and IPSAS compliance. Dheeraj is recognized for transforming intricate accounting challenges into streamlined, risk-resilient business processes.

3.name: Harsh Khetan
3.title: CA
3.description: CA Harsh Khetan is a Chartered Accountant with over 13 years of experience in internal and external audits, policies and procedures, and accounting. He brings extensive experience in organizing and managing external audits for clients across diversified industries and has handled both internal and statutory audits for corporate and listed companies. His professional journey reflects strong expertise in audit execution, compliance, and financial reporting across varied business sectors.

4.name: Mankush Soni
4.title: CA
4.description: CA Mankush Soni is a Chartered Accountant with over 12 years of transfer pricing experience across India, the UAE, the UK, the USA, Japan, and Germany. He advises on transfer pricing planning, compliance, litigation, BEPS, and corporate tax, with experience across sectors including automotive, retail, telecom, and FMCG He has led transfer pricing and corporate tax implementations for multinational and family-owned businesses in the UAE and has extensive experience managing cross-border transfer pricing matters and regulatory engagements across multiple jurisdictions.

5.name: Devang Mehta
5.title: CA, CPA (Ireland)
5.description: Devang Mehta, CA, CPA (Ireland), is a tax and regulatory compliance professional specializing in the KSA and UAE markets, with Big Four experience. He advises clients on VAT, Zakat/ Corporate Income Tax, and cross-border tax and regulatory matters, supporting multinational groups, free zone entities, and growing businesses. Mr. Devang is known for his practical, solution-oriented approach and deep understanding of regional regulations, helping clients navigate complex compliance requirements with confidence and clarity.

6.name: Muhammad Anus
6.title: CA, MS (Accounting & Finance),
6.description: Muhammad Anus, CA, MS (Accounting & Finance), is a Chartered Accountant, with Big Four experience. He specializes in statutory audits, IFRS compliance, and risk management, and has served clients across diverse industries. Muhammad is recognized for his strong technical expertise, professional judgment, and commitment to delivering high-quality, value-driven services.
